descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox drives into the paint and knocks down the floater over two Mavericks defenders to extend the Kings' lead.
videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox drives and drains the floater over 2 Mavs defenders

videos.description: Davion Mitchell dishes it to Donte DiVincenzo for the sweet corner 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Donte DiVincenzo hustles and buries the fadeaway corner 3

videos.description: Justin Holiday gathers the rock and soars to the rim for a Kings flush.
videos.headline: Justin Holiday drives baseline and throws it down

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox drives into the paint and finishes strong with the and-1 to extend the Kings' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (De'Aaron Fox gets the basket plus the foul) 2022/03/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox bulldozes through his defender and drains the and-1

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox is smooth as silk as he glides past multiple Mavericks defenders for the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (De'Aaron Fox drills shot vs. Dallas Mavericks) 2022/03/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox glides past multiple defenders for the bucket

videos.description: Trey Lyles hauls in the dime from Domantas Sabonis and lays in the easy bucket for the Kings.
videos.headline: Sabonis with the absolute dime to Lyles for an easy Kings basket

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox crosses his defender and drains the step-back jumper to extend the Kings' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (De'Aaron Fox impresses with nice shot) 2022/03/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: De'Aaron Fox drills a filthy step-back jumper for the Kings

videos.description: Dwight Powell powers through his defender and gets the and-1 to fall for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dwight Powell gets the hoop and the harm) 2022/03/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dwight Powell muscles through and somehow drains the and-1

videos.description: Davion Mitchell puts a few moves on his defender, drives and lays in the rock as time expires to end the third quarter.
videos.headline: Davion Mitchell is too smooth with this 3rd-quarter buzzer-beater

videos.description: Dorian Finney-Smith pulls up and knocks down the clutch 3-pointer to seal the victory for the Mavericks at home.
videos.headline: Dorian Finney-Smith buries the clutch 3 to seal the home victory
